summary: I OWN A DODGE STEALTH AND THE FRONT DRIVER AND PASSENGER SEAT BELTS DO NOT FUNCTIONS PROPERLY. THEY HAVEN'T WORKED SINCE I HAVE HAD THE VEHICLE. WHEN YOU PULL THE BELT OUT TO STRAP IT IN IT  DOES NOT RETRACT ON ITS OWN. THE BELT RARELY LOCKS WHEN BRAKING .  I DON'T NOT FELL THE BELT WILL PROTECT ME IN AN ACCIDENT.*AK
